## üéØ v2.1 Complete Success Criteria

### Installation & Setup
- [ ] npx install < 5 min (vs. 2-4h)
- [ ] 98% success rate (vs. 60%)
- [ ] Cross-platform (Win + Mac + Linux)

### Architecture
- [ ] 4 modules functional
- [ ] 97+ workers cataloged
- [ ] Service Discovery < 30s
- [ ] Zero breaking changes

### Quality
- [ ] 80% auto-catch rate
- [ ] 75% human review time reduction
- [ ] CodeRabbit working (local + GitHub)
- [ ] Dashboard live

### DevOps
- [ ] GitHub setup < 5 min
- [ ] CI/CD pipelines working
- [ ] Deployment automation

### Documentation
- [ ] 100% coverage
- [ ] 50+ FAQ
- [ ] 5 videos
- [ ] Migration guide tested

## üìä Story Format

Each story follows this format:
- **ID:** Unique identifier
- **√âpico:** Link to parent epic
- **Sprint:** Sprint number
- **Points:** Story points (Fibonacci)
- **Priority:** üî¥ Critical | üü† High | üü° Medium | üü¢ Low
- **User Story:** As/Want/So format
- **Acceptance Criteria:** GIVEN/WHEN/THEN
- **Implementation:** Technical approach
- **Tasks:** Breakdown with estimates
- **Dependencies:** Blocks/Blocked by
- **Definition of Done:** Checklist
